meanings.definition: Exerting a force on an object to draw it toward oneself.
meanings.sent1: The magnet was attracting the metal paperclips.
meanings.sent2: The bright colors are attracting butterflies to the garden.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy was attracting all the attention at the park.
meanings.sent4: Her positive energy was attracting good opportunities into her life.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly baked cookies was attracting customers to the bakery.

meanings.definition: Evoking interest or admiration in someone.
meanings.sent1: The captivating story was attracting many listeners.
meanings.sent2: The attractive artwork was attracting a lot of praise.
meanings.sent3: The funny movie was attracting giggles from the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her charming smile was attracting compliments from everyone.
meanings.sent5: The intriguing mystery novel was attracting readers of all ages.

meanings.definition: Causing someone to come closer or be drawn to something.
meanings.sent1: The inviting aroma was attracting people to the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The interesting exhibit was attracting visitors from far and wide.
meanings.sent3: The cozy fireplace was attracting everyone to gather around.
meanings.sent4: The warm sunshine was attracting people to the beach.
meanings.sent5: The exciting announcement was attracting a crowd to the event.
